runAsAccountId.description: The account ID used to login.

updatedTimeStamp.description: Time when this error was last updated.

ErrorSummariesResourcePatch.description: Object containing tags updates for patch operations.

ErrorSummaryListResult.description: The response of a ErrorSummary list operation.

value.description: The ErrorSummary items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

SpringbootappsModelListResult.description: The response of a SpringbootappsModel list operation.

value.description: The SpringbootappsModel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

appType.description: The application type, whether it is a SpringBoot app.

instanceCount.description: The total instance count the app deployed.

jarFileLocation.description: The jar file location on the server.

miscs.description: The other types of date collected.

instances.description: The breakdown info for app instances on all the servers

runtimeJdkVersion.description: The jdk version installed on server

servers.description: The server list the app installed

machineArmIds.description: The machine ARM id list the app belongs to.

lastModifiedTime.description: Time when this springbootapps jar file was last modified.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Time when this springbootapps instance was last refreshed.

value.description: The application config file content, only contains config keys.

machineArmId.description: The machine ARM resource Id of this app instance

instanceCount.description: The instance count of this app instance

jvmMemoryInMB.description: The jvm heap memory allocated of this app instance

SpringbootserversModelListResult.description: The response of a SpringbootserversModel list operation.

value.description: The SpringbootserversModel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

port.description: Target server port for remote login

server.description: Server is the target server name or ip address to discover of SpringBootServer.

fqdnAndIpAddressList.description: The alternative FQDN or IP addresses to discover for this server

totalApps.description: The total number of apps been discovered

springBootApps.description: The total number of spring boot apps been discovered

SpringbootsitesModelListResult.description: The response of a SpringbootsitesModel list operation.

value.description: The SpringbootsitesModel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

masterSiteId.description: The master site ID from Azure Migrate.

migrateProjectId.description: The migrate project ID from Azure Migrate.

discoveredServers.description: The of number discovered spring boot servers.

discoveredApps.description: The of number discovered spring boot apps.

SummariesResourcePatch.description: Object containing tags updates for patch operations.

SummaryListResult.description: The response of a Summary list operation.

value.description: The Summary items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
